alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Greene; Martin; Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 7:57PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Greene, Pitt, southwestern Martin and northwestern Beaufort Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 757 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Fremont, or 11 miles west of Farmville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Winterville, Farmville, Bethel, Stokes, Snow Hill, Bell Arthur, Robersonville, Pactolus, House, Bruce, Maury, Ormondsville, Roundtree, Lizzie, Pitt Greenville Airport, Dowdy Ficklen Stadium, East Carolina University, Gold Point and Fountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for eastern North Carolina.
